text: The 1951–52 Segunda División season was the 21st since its establishment and was played between 8 September 1951 and 13 April 1952. ==Overview before the season== 32 teams joined the league, including 4 relegated from the 1950–51 La Liga and 4 promoted from the 1950–51 Tercera División. ;Relegated from La Liga: *Málaga *Murcia *Alcoyano *Lérida ;Promoted from Tercera División:''' *Atlético Baleares *Caudal *Alavés *Alicante ==Group North== ===Teams=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: left;" !
